offenceDefinitionId.description: The identifier of the offence from reference data

dateOfInformation.description: The date that the matter is brought to court attention for consideration and for proceeding

judicialResults.description: A record of any judicial decisions and results made against the offence

isDisposed.description: Determines that the offence has been disposed.  Is set by way of an offence that ends proceedings against this offence

isDiscontinued.description: Determines that the offence has been discontinued by the prosecutor i.e. is no longer being proceeded with

isIntroduceAfterInitialProceedings.description: Determines that the offence has been introduced by the prosecutor after proceeedings have already been initiated

laaApplnReferences.description: A record of legal aid applications for this offence

custodyTimeLimit.description: The custody time limit for the individual offence when a defendant has been ordered to be remanded in custody

splitProsecutorCaseReference.description: When the case has been split, indicates the split reference that the prosecutor has decided to assign to this offence i.e. which part of the split that this offence is now being prosecuted under

mergedProsecutionCaseReference.description: When a cases are merged, if this offence is a subject of the merge, the reference is set accordingly
